entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
